bike.description: 100% Cr-Mo, 40mm double butted TT/DT, Euro BB, internally relieved No Oval head tube, weld-on rotor plate, dual lower brake cable routing w/ amplifier, forged 3-D Cr-Mo dropouts for 14mm axle

components.description: 100% Cr-Mo, 1-piece CNC'd steerer tube, butted 1-1/4" blades w/ 6mm drop-outs for 14mm axle
Tank FS 1 1/8" threadless, Cr-Mo, sealed loose ball bearing
SST Oryg w/ dual cable amplifier
Specialized KO jumping, cold forged alloy, CNC relieved, top-load, 50mm reach w/ integrated rotor stops
Specialized 100% Cr-Mo 2-piece, 195mm rise x 620mm width, 10 degree backsweep, 4 degree upsweep
Specialized "Fuse" dual file pattern, no-flange Kraton, 25 durometer, 130mm
Rear only: Dia-Compe AD-990W, U-brake, "Fiesta" kit w/ dual quick release arms
Dia-Compe Tech-77, U-brake lever, two finger
1/2x 1/8" x 12t Cr-Mo cog for cassette hub (See rear hub)
KMC "KOOL" 1/2" x 1/8" nickel plated
Truvative "Luftalarm", forged AL-7050-TV, ISIS, L & R drive compatible, 180mm
Truvative "Luftalarm", CNC cut 6mm thick AL-7075-T6 w/ bolt on CNC cut alloy bash guard, 33t
Truvative "The Quad" BMX, Euro 68x113mm, ISIS spline 22mm heattreated Cr-Mo spindle, 4 sealed cartridge bearings, alloy cups
Specialized "Lo-Pro Mag", magnesium platform, 9/16" over sized heat treated Cr-Mo axle, sealed cartridge bearing, removable allen bolt pins
SUN BigCity, 36h, 20"x 1.75", double wall, welded seam, eyelets, Front Blk Ano., Rear Chrome Plated
Specialized, 36 hole, forged alloy, sealed cartridge bearings, hollow 14mm Cr-Mo axle
Specialized "Flip Side Cassette", dual freehubs for L&R side drive, 36 hole, 6x sealed cartridge bearings, 14mm hollow Cr-Mo axle
2.0mm (14g) stainless steel, brass nipples, L186/R186mm front, L183/R183mm rear
Specialized "Compound", Dual compound, 60tpi w/Cap Ply dual casing, 125psi, 20x2.0"
Specialized "Compound", Dual compound, 60tpi w/Cap Ply dual casing, 125psi, 20x2.0"
20x 2.0" schraeder valve
Specialized Fuse Pro saddle, aramid sides, 9mm Cr-Mo rails w/ X-Brace, front and rear PU handles
Specialized Cr-Mo Pro, 100% Cr-Mo post & clamp, alloy guts, 8mm allen bolts, 30.9mm/300mm for 9mm rails
Forged alloy single bolt design 33.3 x 31.3mm
Specialized "flush mount/anti spin" peg set w/ integrated chain tensioners and fork adapters, alloy fork cap, chainguard cover, reflectors, owners manual
